comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Sorry I won't be able to join today. Welcome back Steve & Adriana.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: If Steve checked his facts before posting he would see that Kevin has/had Frenzy Authority through today, July 11 ([reference](http://flagstafffrenzy.blogspot.com/2007/06/valmont-rez-ride.html)). But I digress...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Damn... After lobbying to ride Flag today, I have to beg off. Just got off the phone w/ my doc and he tells me my [INR's](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prothrombin_time) are way over the top(3.8) and that I need to watch myself today. We're talking paper cuts. No rides for me until I get back in the safe zone. Guess I'll run east on the creek trail.
